p: In the sea bream ( Sparus aurata) and Atlantic salmon ( Salmo salar) natural plant extracts have been successfully employed to prevent lipid oxidation [ 32, 33]. Similarly, damaging of lipids was slowed down by natural antioxidants derived from barley husks in the Atlantic salmon [ 34]. In the cold smoked sardine ( Sardina pilchardus) a coating enriched with oregano or rosemary extracts lowered the lipid oxidation rate [ 35].
